title: How to Win in Star Wars Battlefront 2 Single‐Player

steps.headline: Choose anything but a sniper, unless of course, you're really good at it.
steps.description: View the article on "How to be an effective sniper in Battlefront 2" to help you out there.

steps.headline: Accept the invitation to be a hero whenever you get it.
steps.description: This character usually helps you in-game, and most importantly, usually wields a lightsaber, or is equipped with a powerful gun and/or grenades.

steps.headline: Keep doing what you're doing, if you're winning.
steps.description: If stepping in, throwing a grenade, and stepping back out seems to work for you, then keep on with the same tactics, because the computer opponents are too stupid to know you're doing the same thing over and over.

steps.headline: Work Strategically if you are playing Conquest.
steps.description: Try to take the Command Posts around the edges, to avoid being surrounded and owned.

text: Choose anything but a sniper, unless of course, you're really good at it. View the article on "How to be an effective sniper in Battlefront 2" to help you out there. Accept the invitation to be a hero whenever you get it. This character usually helps you in-game, and most importantly, usually wields a lightsaber, or is equipped with a powerful gun and/or grenades. Keep doing what you're doing, if you're winning. If stepping in, throwing a grenade, and stepping back out seems to work for you, then keep on with the same tactics, because the computer opponents are too stupid to know you're doing the same thing over and over. Work Strategically if you are playing Conquest. Try to take the Command Posts around the edges, to avoid being surrounded and owned.
